    • Method Detail

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Player getter
        Returns:
        Player type spaceship

      • getTimer

        public java.util.Timer getTimer()
        Timer getter
        Returns:
        Timer timer

      • populate

        public void populate​(Game game,
                     int playerHealth)
        Method used to populate the levels with the player's spaceship

        This method is used typically by all level classes that extend this class, they are super called to create the spaceship and they are able to add any other extra bodies that they want for that level.

        Parameters:
        playerHealth - int player's amount of health
        game - the game in which the player is in

      • playerStartPosition

        public abstract org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 playerStartPosition()
        Sets the player starting position

        The levels that extend from this class can set their own starting position for the spaceship created.

        Returns:
        The position of a Player type object in the form of a Vec2

      • isCompleted

        public abstract boolean isCompleted()
        Level completion variable

        The requirements to complete a level are set in this method, if the player does not meet this requirement it is not able to further advance to the next level

        Returns:
        A boolean that calls on if the level is completed or not

      • save

        public void save​(java.lang.String fileName,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 int level,
                 int score,
                 boolean level2WasCompleted,
                 boolean level3WasCompleted,
                 boolean level4WasCompleted)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves game data into a save file

        Saves different data into the save.txt found in the data directory, the data being saved are player name(user), level, score, boolean level2WasCompleted, boolean level3WasCompleted, level4WasCompleted.

        Parameters:
        fileName - file being saved to.
        name - user name by default user.
        level - level in which the player is.
        score - score that the player has.
        level2WasCompleted - first level was completed.
        level3WasCompleted - second level was completed.
        level4WasCompleted - third level was completed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - since it saves into a file errors may occur if the file is not found.

      • loadFile

        public void loadFile​(java.lang.String fileName,
                     Game game)
              throws GameLoadException
        Loads game from a txt file

        Loads the game from a txt file where the data was saved, the data is in a sentence and is split over tabs then the data is setted at the end of the method

        Parameters:
        fileName - from which file is the data read
        game - to which game is the information loaded
        Throws:
        GameLoadException - since there may be no file with the fileName it can throw an exception if there is a typo in the file name or the file doesn't exist to begin with
